00755   struct maximum : public binary_function<T,T,T>

00867 template<typename Predicate>
00868 struct unary_negate 
00869     : public thrust::unary_function<typename Predicate::argument_type, bool>
00870 {
00874   __host__ __device__
00875   explicit unary_negate(Predicate p) : pred(p){}
00876 
00879   __host__ __device__
00880   bool operator()(const typename Predicate::argument_type& x) { return !pred(x); }
00881 
00883   Predicate pred;
00885 }; // end unary_negate
00886 
00903 template<typename Predicate>
00904   __host__ __device__
00905   unary_negate<Predicate> not1(const Predicate &pred);
00906 
00917 template<typename Predicate>
00918 struct binary_negate
00919     : public thrust::binary_function<typename Predicate::first_argument_type,
00920                                      typename Predicate::second_argument_type,
00921                                      bool>
00922 {
00926   __host__ __device__
00927   explicit binary_negate(Predicate p) : pred(p){}
00928 
00931   __host__ __device__
00932   bool operator()(const typename Predicate::first_argument_type& x, const typename Predicate::second_argument_type& y)
00933   { 
00934       return !pred(x,y); 
00935   }
00936 
00938   Predicate pred;
00940 }; // end binary_negate
